  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Impact of the Air Pollution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswirkung der Luftverschmutzung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Impact de la pollution atmosphérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Impacto da poluição de ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto dell'inquinamento atmosferico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίκτυπος της ατμοσφαιρικής ρύπανσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Impacto de la contaminación atmosférica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This item presents information about global warming, ozone depletion, and acid rain. Includes great graphics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Einzelteil stellt Informationen über das 
globale Wärmen, Ozon-Entleerung und sauren Regen dar. Enthält 
große Graphiken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet élément présente des informations sur le 
chauffage global, l'épuisement de l'ozone, et les pluies acides. 
Inclut de grands graphiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo apresenta a informação sobre 
aquecer-se global, depletion do ozônio, e a chuva ácida. 
Inclui gráficos grandes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo presenta le informazioni sul 
riscaldamento globale, sullo svuotamento dell'ozono e sulla pioggia 
acida. Include i grafici grandi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το αντικείμενο παρουσιάζει τις πληροφορίες για 
την παγκόσμια αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του φαινομένου του 
θερμοκηπίου, τη μείωση όζοντος, και την όξινη βροχή. 
Περιλαμβάνει τη μεγάλη γραφική παράσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este item presenta la información sobre 
calentarse global, el agotamiento del ozono, y la lluvia ácida. 
Incluye grandes gráficos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
